description.brief: SICK Toolbox drivers for SICK laser rangefinders

package.description: This package contains the SICK LIDAR Matlab/C++ Toolbox, available from http://sicktoolbox.sourceforge.net/. The SICK LIDAR Matlab/C++ Toolbox offers stable and easy-to-use C++ drivers for SICK LMS 2xx and SICK LD LIDARs. It provides a Matlab Mex interface for streaming LIDAR returns directly into Matlab. Also included are config utilities, examples, and tutorials. This package contains version 1.0 of the toolbox.
package.author: Maintained by Jason Derenick of the GRASP Laboratory at the University of Pennsylvania
